about_the_game:
Summary:

A thoughtful adventure centered around diversity and racial tension in a world where people treat others differently because of their eye color. Embrace mystical power as you begin to collect the much sought-after "fallen feathers" In this opening act of a sprawling adventure about loss, corruption, ethnocentrism, life lessons & growing up. A socially progressive RPG where "saving the world" is more about saving the people around you.

Features:

- Crush your enemies in style with fast moving Turn-Based Combat!

- Gather "Fallen Feathers" to unlock magical powers that can aid you both in and out of battle!

- Explore a beautiful, floating, island city brimming with life and a seedy underbelly to uncover!

- Be immersed by segments of 2.5D visuals that bring 2D pixels to life against 3D and/or Digitally-Drawn Environments!

- Enjoy Visual Novel type cutscenes with a Japanese Shonen manga aesthetic!

- Overcome several Puzzles, Mazes, & QTEs!

- Salvage parts from enemies and craft resources to upgrade your own weapons & armor!

- Boosts the city's opinion of one another via side-quests!

& Much More!

A socially progressive RPG where "saving the world" is more about saving the people around you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

name: Fallen Feather

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: A turn-based RPG that encourages diversity. A young man begins his crusade for social change in this opening act of a multi-part series.
